verses.verse: וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> now behold אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> a man אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God בָּ֧א <WH935> And behold there came מִיהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> out of Judah בִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> by the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> unto Bethel וְיָרָבְעָ֛ם <WH3379> and Jeroboam עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> stood עַל־ <WH5921> by הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> by the altar לְהַקְטִֽיר׃ <WH6999> to burn incense

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> And he cried עַל־ <WH5921> against הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> against the altar בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> in the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said מִזְבֵּ֣חַ <WH4196> O altar מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> altar כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> Behold בֵ֞ן <WH1121> Behold a child נוֹלָ֤ד <WH3205> shall be born לְבֵית־ <WH1004> unto the house דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> of David יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <WH2977> Josiah שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> by name וְזָבַ֣ח <WH2076> and upon thee shall he offer עָלֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> against אֶת־ <WH853> כֹּהֲנֵ֤י <WH3548> the priests הַבָּמוֹת֙ <WH1116> of the high places הַמַּקְטִרִ֣ים <WH6999> that burn incense עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> against וְעַצְמ֥וֹת <WH6106> bones אָדָ֖ם <WH120> upon thee and men's יִשְׂרְפ֥וּ <WH8313> shall be burnt עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> against

וְנָתַן֩ <WH5414> And he gave בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַה֤וּא <WH1931> the same מוֹפֵת֙ <WH4159> a sign לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַמּוֹפֵ֔ת <WH4159> This [is] the sign אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> which the LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> Behold the altar נִקְרָ֔ע <WH7167> shall be rent וְנִשְׁפַּ֖ךְ <WH8210> that [are] upon it shall be poured out הַדֶּ֥שֶׁן <WH1880> and the ashes אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> heard הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And it came to pass when king אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> the saying אִישׁ־ <WH376> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which קָרָ֤א <WH7121> which had cried עַל־ <WH5921> against הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> against the altar בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> in Bethel וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> that he put forth יָרָבְעָ֧ם <WH3379> Jeroboam אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֛וֹ <WH3027> his hand מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> against הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> from the altar לֵאמֹ֣ר ׀ <WH559> saying תִּפְשֻׂ֑הוּ <WH8610> Lay hold וַתִּיבַ֤שׁ <WH3001> against him dried up יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> on him And his hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> which he put forth עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> against וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָכֹ֖ל <WH3201> so that he could לַהֲשִׁיבָ֥הּ <WH7725> not pull it in again אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

וְהַמִּזְבֵּ֣חַ <WH4196> The altar נִקְרָ֔ע <WH7167> also was rent וַיִּשָּׁפֵ֥ךְ <WH8210> poured out הַדֶּ֖שֶׁן <WH1880> and the ashes מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> from the altar כַּמּוֹפֵ֗ת <WH4159> according to the sign אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֛ן <WH5414> had given אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> which the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God בִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> by the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God חַל־ <WH2470> Intreat נָ֞א <WH4994> Please אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> now the face יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God וְהִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> and pray בַּעֲדִ֔י <WH1157> about וְתָשֹׁ֥ב <WH7725> may be restored me again יָדִ֖י <WH3027> for me that my hand אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about וַיְחַ֤ל <WH2470> entreated אִישׁ־ <WH376> And the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> accept יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַתָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> was restored him again יַד־ <WH3027> hand הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> and the king's אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him וַתְּהִ֖י <WH1961> became כְּבָרִֽאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <WH7223> and became as [it was] before

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> And the king אֶל־ <WH413> to אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God בֹּאָה־ <WH935> Come אִתִּ֥י <WH854> for הַבַּ֖יְתָה <WH1004> home וּֽסְעָ֑דָה <WH5582> with me and refresh וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> thyself and I will give לְךָ֖ מַתָּֽת׃ <WH4991> thee a reward

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אִישׁ־ <WH376> And the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king אִם־ <WH518> If תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> If thou wilt give לִי֙ אֶת־ <WH853> חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> me half בֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> thine house לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor אָבֹ֖א <WH935> I will not go in עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> you וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אֹ֤כַל <WH398> with thee neither will I eat לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> bread וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor אֶשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> nor drink מַּ֔יִם <WH4325> water בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כֵ֣ן ׀ <WH3651> so צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> For so was it charged אֹתִ֗י <WH853> בִּדְבַ֤ר <WH1697> me by the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לֹא־ <WH3808> no תֹ֥אכַל <WH398> Eat לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> no bread וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> nor drink מָּ֑יִם <WH4325> water וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תָשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> nor turn again בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the same way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הָלָֽכְתָּ׃ <WH1980> that thou camest

וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> way אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> another וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> and returned בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> not by the way אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which בָּ֥א <WH935> that he came בָ֖הּ אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> to Bethel פ

וְנָבִ֤יא <WH5030> prophet אֶחָד֙ <WH259> an זָקֵ֔ן <WH2205> old יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> Now there dwelt בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> in Bethel וַיָּב֣וֹא <WH935> came בְנ֡וֹ <WH1121> and his sons וַיְסַפֶּר־ <WH5608> and told ל֣וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH4639> him all the works אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂה֩ <WH6213> had done אִישׁ־ <WH376> that the man הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <WH430> of God הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> that day בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֗ל <WH1008> in Bethel אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִים֙ <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> which he had spoken אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king וַֽיְסַפְּר֖וּם <WH5608> them they told לַאֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> also to their father

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> about אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> And their father אֵֽי־ <WH335> what זֶ֥ה <WH2088> he הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> unto them What way הָלָ֑ךְ <WH1980> went וַיִּרְא֣וּ <WH7200> had seen בָנָ֗יו <WH1121> he? For his sons אֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> way אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which הָלַךְ֙ <WH1980> went אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֖א <WH935> which came מִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> from Judah

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to his בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> unto his sons חִבְשׁוּ־ <WH2280> Saddle לִ֖י הַחֲמ֑וֹר <WH2543> me the ass וַיַּחְבְּשׁוּ־ <WH2280> So they saddled ל֣וֹ הַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> him the ass וַיִּרְכַּ֖ב <WH7392> and he rode עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> went אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וַיִּ֨מְצָאֵ֔הוּ <WH4672> and found יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> him sitting תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הָאֵלָ֑ה <WH424> under an oak וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and he said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about הַאַתָּ֧ה <WH859> are you אִישׁ־ <WH376> unto him [Art] thou the man הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֥אתָ <WH935> that camest מִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> Judah וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> he
וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then he said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> Come אִתִּ֖י <WH854> for הַבָּ֑יְתָה <WH1004> home וֶאֱכֹ֖ל <WH398> with me and eat לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor אוּכַ֛ל <WH3201> I may לָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> not return אִתָּ֖ךְ <WH854> for וְלָב֣וֹא <WH935> with thee nor go in אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> for וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אֹ֣כַל <WH398> with thee neither will I eat לֶ֗חֶם <WH3899> bread וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אֶשְׁתֶּ֤ה <WH8354> nor drink אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> for מַ֔יִם <WH4325> water בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> with thee in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For דָבָ֤ר <WH1697> For it was said אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> to me by the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תֹאכַ֣ל <WH398> Thou shalt eat לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> no bread וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִשְׁתֶּ֥ה <WH8354> nor drink שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there מָ֑יִם <WH4325> water לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> there nor turn again לָלֶ֔כֶת <WH1980> that thou camest בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָלַ֥כְתָּ <WH1980> going בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> He said ל֗וֹ גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I נָבִיא֮ <WH5030> unto him I [am] a prophet כָּמוֹךָ֒ <WH3644> like וּמַלְאָ֡ךְ <WH4397> also as thou [art] and an angel דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> spake אֵלַי֩ <WH413> to me בִּדְבַ֨ר <WH1697> unto me by the word יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying הֲשִׁבֵ֤הוּ <WH7725> Bring him back אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> for אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> with thee into thine house וְיֹ֥אכַל <WH398> that he may eat לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> bread וְיֵ֣שְׁתְּ <WH8354> and drink מָ֑יִם <WH4325> water כִּחֵ֖שׁ <WH3584> [But] he lied לֽוֹ׃

וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> So he went back אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for וַיֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> with him and did eat לֶ֛חֶם <WH3899> bread בְּבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> in his house וַיֵּ֥שְׁתְּ <WH8354> and drank מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came הֵ֥ם <WH1992> as they יֹשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> And it came to pass as they sat אֶל־ <WH413> at הַשֻּׁלְחָ֑ן <WH7979> at the table פ וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> that the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> came unto the prophet אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הֱשִׁיבֽוֹ׃ <WH7725> that brought him back

וַיִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> And he cried אֶל־ <WH413> to אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֤א <WH935> that came מִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> from Judah לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Forasmuch as כִּ֤י <WH3588> for מָרִ֙יתָ֙ <WH4784> thou hast disobeyed פִּ֣י <WH6310> the mouth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <WH8104> and hast not kept אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <WH4687> the commandment אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

וַתָּ֗שָׁב <WH7725> But camest back וַתֹּ֤אכַל <WH398> and hast eaten לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> bread וַתֵּ֣שְׁתְּ <WH8354> and drunk מַ֔יִם <WH4325> water בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> of the which [the LORD] did say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> no תֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> to thee Eat לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> no bread וְאַל־ <WH408> no תֵּ֣שְׁתְּ <WH8354> and drink מָ֑יִם <WH4325> no water לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תָב֥וֹא <WH935> shall not come נִבְלָתְךָ֖ <WH5038> thy carcase אֶל־ <WH413> to קֶ֥בֶר <WH6913> unto the sepulchre אֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> of thy fathers

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> And it came to pass after אָכְל֥וֹ <WH398> he had eaten לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> bread וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> and after שְׁתוֹת֑וֹ <WH8354> he had drunk וַיַּחֲבָשׁ־ <WH2280> that he saddled ל֣וֹ הַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> for him the ass לַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> [to wit] for the prophet אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֱשִׁיבֽוֹ׃ <WH7725> whom he had brought back

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <WH1980> had gone וַיִּמְצָאֵ֧הוּ <WH4672> met אַרְיֵ֛ה <WH738> a lion בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> him by the way וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <WH4191> and slew וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> become נִבְלָתוֹ֙ <WH5038> him and his carcase מֻשְׁלֶ֣כֶת <WH7993> was cast בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way וְהַחֲמוֹר֙ <WH2543> and the ass עֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> stood אֶצְלָ֔הּ <WH681> by וְהָ֣אַרְיֵ֔ה <WH738> it the lion עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> also stood אֵ֥צֶל <WH681> beside הַנְּבֵלָֽה׃ <WH5038> by the carcase

וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> and behold אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> men עֹבְרִ֗ים <WH5674> passed by וַיִּרְא֤וּ <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּבֵלָה֙ <WH5038> the carcase מֻשְׁלֶ֣כֶת <WH7993> cast בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אַרְיֵ֔ה <WH738> and the lion עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> standing אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> by הַנְּבֵלָ֑ה <WH5038> the carcase וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and they came וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> and told בָעִ֔יר <WH5892> [it] in the city אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> where הַנָּבִ֥יא <WH5030> prophet הַזָּקֵ֖ן <WH2205> where the old יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> dwelt בָּֽהּ׃

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard הַנָּבִיא֮ <WH5030> And when the prophet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הֱשִׁיב֣וֹ <WH7725> that brought him back מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּרֶךְ֒ <WH1870> from the way וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> [thereof] he said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> It [is] the man הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> of God ה֔וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who מָרָ֖ה <WH4784> who was disobedient אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֣י <WH6310> unto the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנֵ֨הוּ <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> therefore the LORD לָאַרְיֵ֗ה <WH738> him unto the lion וַֽיִּשְׁבְּרֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7665> which hath torn וַיְמִתֵ֔הוּ <WH4191> him and slain כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> him according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> which he spake לֽוֹ׃

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> And he spake אֶל־ <WH413> to his בָּנָיו֙ <WH1121> to his sons לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying חִבְשׁוּ־ <WH2280> Saddle לִ֖י אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַחֲמ֑וֹר <WH2543> me the ass וַֽיַּחֲבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <WH2280> And they saddled

וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַיִּמְצָ֤א <WH4672> and found אֶת־ <WH853> נִבְלָתוֹ֙ <WH5038> his carcase מֻשְׁלֶ֣כֶת <WH7993> cast בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way וַֽחֲמוֹר֙ <WH2543> and the ass וְהָ֣אַרְיֵ֔ה <WH738> and the lion עֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> standing אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> by הַנְּבֵלָ֑ה <WH5038> the carcase לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אָכַ֤ל <WH398> had not eaten הָֽאַרְיֵה֙ <WH738> the lion אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּבֵלָ֔ה <WH5038> the carcase וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor שָׁבַ֖ר <WH7665> nor torn אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַחֲמֽוֹר׃ <WH2543> the ass

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> took up הַנָּבִ֜יא <WH5030> And the prophet אֶת־ <WH853> נִבְלַ֧ת <WH5038> the carcase אִישׁ־ <WH376> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> of God וַיַּנִּחֵ֥הוּ <WH3240> and laid אֶֽל־ <WH413> on הַחֲמ֖וֹר <WH2543> it upon the ass וַיְשִׁיבֵ֑הוּ <WH7725> and brought it back וַיָּבֹ֗א <WH935> came אֶל־ <WH413> to עִיר֙ <WH5892> to the city הַנָּבִ֣יא <WH5030> prophet הַזָּקֵ֔ן <WH2205> and the old לִסְפֹּ֖ד <WH5594> to mourn וּלְקָבְרֽוֹ׃ <WH6912> and to bury

וַיַּנַּ֥ח <WH3240> And he laid אֶת־ <WH853> נִבְלָת֖וֹ <WH5038> his carcase בְּקִבְר֑וֹ <WH6913> in his own grave וַיִּסְפְּד֥וּ <WH5594> and they mourned עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> over ה֥וֹי <WH1945> over him [saying] Alas אָחִֽי׃ <WH251> my brother

וַיְהִי֮ <WH1961> become אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> And it came to pass after קָבְר֣וֹ <WH6912> he had buried אֹתוֹ֒ <WH853> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> him that he spake אֶל־ <WH413> to his בָּנָיו֙ <WH1121> to his sons לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בְּמוֹתִי֙ <WH4191> When I am dead וּקְבַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH6912> then bury אֹתִ֔י <WH853> בַּקֶּ֕בֶר <WH6913> me in the sepulchre אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> wherein the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God קָב֣וּר <WH6912> [is] buried בּ֑וֹ אֵ֚צֶל <WH681> beside עַצְמֹתָ֔יו <WH6106> my bones הַנִּ֖יחוּ <WH3240> lay אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמֹתָֽי׃ <WH6106> his bones

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for הָיֹ֨ה <WH1961> shall surely יִהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> come הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> For the saying אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which קָרָא֙ <WH7121> which he cried בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> by the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> against הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> against the altar אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> in Bethel וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּתֵּ֣י <WH1004> and against all the houses הַבָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> of the high places אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> which [are] in the cities שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> of Samaria פ

אַחַר֙ <WH310> After הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁ֥ב <WH7725> returned יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> Jeroboam מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <WH1870> way הָרָעָ֑ה <WH7451> not from his evil וַ֠יָּשָׁב <WH7725> again וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <WH6213> but made מִקְצ֤וֹת <WH7098> of the lowest הָעָם֙ <WH5971> of the people כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <WH3548> priests בָמ֔וֹת <WH1116> of the high places הֶֽחָפֵץ֙ <WH2655> whosoever would יְמַלֵּ֣א <WH4390> accomplish אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> able וִיהִ֖י <WH1961> become כֹּהֲנֵ֥י <WH3548> him and he became [one] of the priests בָמֽוֹת׃ <WH1116> of the high places

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> became בַּדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> And this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> This לְחַטַּ֖את <WH2403> became sin בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יָרָבְעָ֑ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam וּלְהַכְחִיד֙ <WH3582> even to cut [it] off וּלְהַשְׁמִ֔יד <WH8045> and to destroy מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> off פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> [it] from off the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the earth פ
